profile.name: Vasu Yadav
profile.summary: Software Developer with experience building and maintaining SaaS platforms, dashboards, and backend systems in startup environments. Hands-on experience with full-stack development, AI integrations, social media APIs, and cloud infrastructure. Comfortable owning features end-to-end, working across frontend, backend, and deployment.

experience.work_description: Built the Brand Dashboard from scratch to allow brands to create, manage, and collaborate on marketing campaigns. Implemented AI-based campaign creation using Google Gemini (Vertex AI), which analyzes brand websites and open-source information to generate campaign suggestions. Developed features for managing existing campaigns, inviting users, and handling brand-level access through a brand manager view. Built an Influencer Dashboard to enable influencers to onboard, connect with brands, participate in campaigns, and manage social media posts. Implemented backend services for onboarding brands and influencers via Facebook and Instagram, handling authentication, metrics retrieval, post creation, and scheduling. Worked on deployment and maintenance of production systems and managed cloud infrastructure.

Developed and maintained backend services for inventory, store, farm, and farmer management systems. Worked on Admin panel APIs as well as APIs consumed by the Farmer app and RM app. Built and enhanced frontend components for internal dashboards and data visualization. Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve backend and frontend integration and maintain production systems.

Contributed to backend development and deployment tasks. Assisted in deploying the company website on AWS using S3, Route 53, and CloudFront with SSL. Built REST APIs integrated with Google Sheets API to manage client data. Created and maintained backend API documentation and implemented email communication workflows.

projects.name: Venture Vault
projects.description: Developed a platform for discovering and validating startup ideas. Integrated OpenAI APIs to analyze industry ideas and generate actionable feedback. Implemented real-time chat functionality to support collaboration and curated large datasets from Reddit to identify common pain points and idea patterns.

projects.name: Wingman
projects.description: Built a Chrome extension for AI-powered meeting transcription and contextual responses. Implemented offline storage for meeting transcripts and optimized rendering to support low-end devices.

cloud_and_tools: Google Cloud Platform (Compute Engine, VPC, IAM, Buckets, Artifact Registry)
